sentences.sContent: “Right now, we’re just getting to the phase where people appreciate how an “immersive” digital environment can be as complex and rich as sensation, ” he says.
sentences.sCn: “现在，我们要进入一个阶段，让人们能够领会到‘沉浸式’数字环境可以像感觉一样复杂而丰富，”他说

trans.tranOther: providing information or stimulation for a number of senses, not only sight and sound
